thread.title: Meet With Surgical Notes at Upcoming Ambulatory Surgery Center Tradeshows
thread.title_full: Meet With Surgical Notes at Upcoming Ambulatory Surgery Center Tradeshows

title: Meet With Surgical Notes at Upcoming Ambulatory Surgery Center Tradeshows
text:
Meet With Surgical Notes at Upcoming Ambulatory Surgery Center Tradeshows [September 09, 2015] Tweet 
DALLAS , Sept. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Surgical Notes, a nationwide provider of transcription, coding, document management, and electronic health record applications for the ambulatory surgery center (ASC) and surgical hospital markets, will be exhibiting at numerous ASC conferences and tradeshows through the end of the year. 
Attendees of these meetings can visit Surgical Notes' exhibit booth to learn about the company's scalable ASC solutions that include transcription and coding, chart automation and document management, central billing office software, and electronic health records. Attendees can also schedule an on-site demo of any of these solutions. The largest ASC management companies and over 20,000 healthcare providers trust Surgical Notes' cutting-edge revenue cycle management solutions and services to enhancethe financial strength and performance of their ASCs. 
Surgical Notes will be exhibiting at the following conferences: 
September California Ambulatory Surgery Association 2015 Annual Conference & Exhibits Tennessee ASC Association Fall Conference & Tradeshow Texas Ambulatory Surgery Center Society 2015 Annual Meeting 
October 2015 Pennsylvania Ambulatory Surgery Association Annual Meeting ASCA 2015 Fall Seminar Becker's ASC 22nd Annual Meeting: The Business & Operations of ASCs New Jersey Association of Ambulatory Surgery Centers Annual Conference 
November Maryland Ambulatory Surgery Association Annual Conference Oregon Ambulatory Surgery Center Association 2015 Annual Conference 
"We look forward to all of these excellent programs," said Randy Bishop , Chief Operating Officer for Surgical Notes. "Attending and exhibiting gives us the opportunity to meet and speak with current clients, prospective clients and leaders in the ASC industry, and display and provide demos of our wide range of products and services. We are also happy to support the great work of the host associations and organizations that bring together ASC representatives from throughout the country for critical education and networking." 
To learn more and schedule a demo at one of these meetings, click here . 
About Surgical Notes, Inc. Surgical Notes, Inc. is a nationwide provider of transcription, coding, document management and electronic health record applications. The largest management companies and over 20,000 healthcare providers trust Surgical Notes' cutting-edge revenue cycle management solutions and services to enhance the financial strength and performance of their ASCs. Founded in 1997, Surgical Notes is an industry innovator and leader. For more information, visit www.SurgicalNotes.com .
